item.title: Lost Oasis: Remembering the Tropicana Country Club - A Vintage Las Vegas Story
item.description:
A Dream of Suburban Serenity

Las Vegas. The name conjures images of glittering lights, high-stakes gambling, and non-stop entertainment. But rewind to the mid-1950s, and the city was wrestling with its identity. While tourism was booming, a different vision was brewing â€“ one of a Las Vegas with lasting appeal, a place where people could live, not just visit. Enter the Tropicana Country Club, an ambitious and ultimately fleeting attempt to realize that dream.
